caption:
“Grace meets you on the road.”

Reflection:
You need not arrive to be received. Grace travels faster than your weariness.

Commentary:
This line reminds us that God’s mercy meets us mid-journey. We are not loved because we’ve arrived, but because we are still walking.

#VeniFaithful #VeniPublishing #FaithInMotion #PilgrimHeart #BlessedInTheBusy #GraceInTheGrind #EverydayFaith #ChristianInspiration #BibleVerseOfTheDay
